## Type.isInstance() method

Test if the given value is an instance of this type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isInstance(value: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>any</code> | The value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
